bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lao zhai 勞瘵 , exhaustion consumption. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 8: 世醫 例以傳屍骨蒸為五勞者，非也。彼乃瘵疾，各一門類，不可不知 , “Contemporary physicians list it together with chuan shi 傳屍 , corpse [evil] transmission, and gu cheng 骨蒸 , bone steaming, as one of the wu lao 五勞 , five types of exhaustion. This is wrong. These consumption ailments constitute a group by themselves. Everybody should be aware of this”.
